DOC.brief_summary: Livedo vasculitis disease recurrent course painful foot ankle ulceration , follow heal white scar . The actual mechanism pathophysiology yet clear . It report associated gene mutation , example , factor V Leiden gene . This study aim find possible relation gene mutation Taiwanese patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Livedo vasculitis chronic , recurrent painful ulceration ankles foot . This chronic disease characterize healed white , atrophic scar name atrophie blanche . The histopathological exam lesion site reveals fibrin deposition within vessel wall . It report related factor V Leiden mutation ( heterozygous ) ( 22.2 % ) , prothrombin G20210A gene mutation ( 8.3 % ) , PAI promotor 4G/4G genotype methylenetetrahydrofolate reductase ( MTHFR ) C677T mutation total 30 % livedo vasculitis patient . This study try find correlation Taiwanese patient four gene .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis livedo vasculitis No special exclusion criterion
